data.message: How can we change it so I don't see a million different "so-and-so commented on such-and-such"

replies.message: Hi Treva. You can adjust what you see in your News Feed by choosing to view stories you don't want to see, by following or unfollowing friends and by using friends lists. Learn how at: http://on.fb.me/WkjYsa -Sarah

Using filters and restricting our friendlist is not the answer. Youve yet to answer the issue properly facebook. We dont want to see what everyone likes and comments on nor our comments on every post and every like revealed to everone. Filters abd news feed augmentation does not fix this serious problem
Or posts that my friends friend that I am not friends with on my news feed.
